name: Prison Escape Text game (allan_ackerman)
description: Welcome to My prison escape game, ok I know I spoke like a YouTuber, but I am so excited to show you, it is possible to dive into an adventure with text games too, in this game you will choose your actions step by step and try to escape from prison(don't do this in real life), sometimes your step can fail, sometimes you should choose you to have to continue or not, but I hope you will enjoy from my project, so don't forget it there can be true answer more than 1..
